metadata.title: CVE-2019-14744 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In KDE Frameworks KConfig before 5.61.0, malicious desktop files andconfiguration files lead to code execution with minimal user interaction.This relates to libKF5ConfigCore.so, and the mishandling of .desktop and.directory files, as demonstrated by a shell command on an Icon line in a.desktop file.

criterions.comment: kde4libs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
